option.value: { "name": "web", "version": "0.0.1", "type": "module", "private": true, "scripts": { "dev": "next dev --turbopack", "build": "pnpm --filter=@repo/db db:generate && next build", "start": "next start", "lint": "next lint", "lint:fix": "next lint --fix", "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit", "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\" \"test/**/*.ts\"", "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.ts\" \"test/**/*.ts\"" }, "dependencies": { "@dnd-kit/core": "^6.3.1", "@dnd-kit/modifiers": "^9.0.0", "@dnd-kit/sortable": "^10.0.0", "@dnd-kit/utilities": "^3.2.2", "@google/genai": "^0.10.0", "@google/generative-ai": "^0.24.0", "@hookform/resolvers": "^4.1.3", "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.72.0", "@tanstack/react-table": "^8.21.3", "@workspace/ui": "workspace:*", "@workspace/types": "workspace:*", "axios": "^1.8.4", "clsx": "^2.1.1", "date-fns": "^4.1.0", "docx": "^9.4.1", "file-saver": "^2.0.5", "framer-motion": "^12.23.6", "lucide-react": "^0.475.0", "next": "^15.2.3", "next-auth": "^4.24.11", "next-themes": "^0.4.4", "react": "^19.0.0", "react-dom": "^19.0.0", "react-hook-form": "^7.55.0", "sonner": "^2.0.2", "tailwind-merge": "^3.0.1", "yup": "^1.6.1", "zod": "^3.24.2" }, "devDependencies": { "@tanstack/eslint-plugin-query": "^5.72.0", "@types/node": "^20", "@types/react": "^19", "@types/react-dom": "^19", "@workspace/eslint-config": "workspace:^", "@workspace/typescript-config": "workspace:*", "typescript": "^5.7.3" } }

option.value: { "name": "shadcn-ui-monorepo", "version": "0.0.1", "private": true, "scripts": { "build": "turbo build", "check-types": "turbo check-types", "dev": "turbo dev", "lint": "turbo lint", "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,md}\"", "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{ts,tsx,md}\"", "prepare": "husky", "db:generate": "turbo db:generate", "db:deploy": "turbo db:deploy", "build:deploy": "pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:deploy && turbo build" }, "devDependencies": { "@workspace/eslint-config": "workspace:*", "@workspace/typescript-config": "workspace:*", "husky": "^9.1.7", "prettier": "^3.5.1", "turbo": "^2.5.0", "typescript": "5.7.3" }, "packageManager": "pnpm@10.4.1", "engines": { "node": ">=20" } }
